thread.title: Gollum Sings a Precious Cover of ‘Time After Time’ by Cyndi Lauper
thread.title_full: Gollum Sings a Precious Cover of ‘Time After Time’ by Cyndi Lauper

author: Justin Page
title: Gollum Sings a Precious Cover of ‘Time After Time’ by Cyndi Lauper
text:
Oakland, California 6th grade history and science teacher Ian Walters has returned as Gollum from The Lord of the Rings to perform a precious cover of the hit 1983 song “ Time After Time ” by Cyndi Lauper . Ian created the video to promote a Kickstarter campaign for his band, Headphone Hair , and their first full-length music album. Here is Cyndi’s original song for comparison.

A post shared by Ian Walters (@ijameswalters) on Mar 19, 2017 at 1:25pm PDT 

Thanks Adam Haroff ! 
Related Laughing Squid Posts Gollum Singing a Precious Rendition of the Song ‘Somebody That I Used to Know’ by Gotye A Vintage 1912 Waltz Version of Cyndi Lauper’s 1983 Song ‘Girls Just Want to Have Fun’ by Postmodern Jukebox Gollum Covers ‘Empire State of Mind’ by Jay-Z and Alicia Keys
